data.text:
(Today, is the end of the camp. 
I...  wonder if I have learned properly. Did I grow?)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>(Today, is the end of the camp. 
<story>I...  wonder if I have learned properly. Did I grow?)

data.text: Trainer is always praising me, though
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Trainer is always praising me, though

data.text:
(I'm not only happy to receive compliments, but also... 
I want to be able to be proud of those words. 
How in the world do I-)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>(I'm not only happy to receive compliments, but also... 
<story>I want to be able to be proud of those words. 
<story>How in the world do I-)

data.text:
Oh, hey, hey! I heard there's a festival today! 
I saw it on the bulletin board!
data.name: Horse girl A
data.processed:
<story>Oh, hey, hey! I heard there's a festival today! 
<story>I saw it on the bulletin board!

data.text: Huh!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Huh!

data.text:
Yeah, you've got to go for sure! 
been doing good on training, 
Trainer must treat me for that atleast~
data.name: Horse Girl B
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, you've got to go for sure! 
<story>been doing good on training, 
<story>Trainer must treat me for that atleast~

data.text: T-This is it!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>T-This is it!

data.text:
(1 steps to change myself. 
Dare to get the starting line! From me!)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>(1 steps to change myself. 
<story>Dare to get the starting line! From me!)

data.text:
Food stalls line the streets, 
and festive lights and music surround the area. 
The distant sound of drums seems to lift one's spirits

choices.text: Looks fun, thanks for inviting me!

data.processed:
<story>Food stalls line the streets, 
<story>and festive lights and music surround the area. 
<story>The distant sound of drums seems to lift one's spirits

data.text:
No, not at all! its... yes, 
Thank you too...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>No, not at all! its... yes, 
<story>Thank you too...

data.text:
(Fwuaah. I manage to invite, I did invite but... 
What should I do? Will I be able to entertain Trainer properly?)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>(Fwuaah. I manage to invite, I did invite but... 
<story>What should I do? Will I be able to entertain Trainer properly?)

data.text:
(No, I know how to have fun at a Festival! 
I'm going to make noise and have fun today like the other kids around me!)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>(No, I know how to have fun at a Festival! 
<story>I'm going to make noise and have fun today like the other kids around me!)

data.text:
T- Trainer, let's play... together! 
Oh, look! That stall over there is empty
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>T- Trainer, let's play... together! 
<story>Oh, look! That stall over there is empty

data.text:
-Mold cutting. Because my own had long been cut in half, 
I watch Cheval Grand is silently grinding away
data.processed:
<story>-Mold cutting. Because my own had long been cut in half, 
<story>I watch Cheval Grand is silently grinding away

data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>......... 
<story>Hmm.. mmm.. uhm.... Ahh!?

data.text:
I'm sorry, Trainer! 
I got carried away. This is too boring-
data.name: Cheval Grand

choices.text: That focus sure is one of your strengths!
choices.processed: <size=40>That focus sure is one of your strengths!</size>

choices.text: That focus sure is one of your strengths!
choices.processed: <size=40>That focus sure is one of your strengths!</size>

data.text:
Ahhh... next one... let's do something more exciting! 
A more thrilling and exciting...!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>Ahhh... next one... let's do something more exciting! 
<story>A more thrilling and exciting...!

data.text:
-pull the string and guess, a raffle draw. 
The products were all for children, but the excitement was certainly there
data.processed:
<story>-pull the string and guess, a raffle draw. 
<story>The products were all for children, but the excitement was certainly there

data.text:
Ah, Um! Please let me know what you want, Trainer... 
I... will do my best and try to get it...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>Ah, Um! Please let me know what you want, Trainer... 
<story>I... will do my best and try to get it...

data.text:
I understand! Let's see, it's a little bit in the front, so... 
The string in the back is different. And this one, too, 
in terms of length out the top...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>I understand! Let's see, it's a little bit in the front, so... 
<story>The string in the back is different. And this one, too, 
<story>in terms of length out the top...

data.text:
And then there's... This one seems to stick out more than the others, 
This one is...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>And then there's... This one seems to stick out more than the others, 
<story>This one is...

data.text:
Ha-ha-ha! Girl, you've got to pull out all the stops on these things! 
The back of the line is starting to line up, so it's time to get to it!
data.name: Raffle Shop Uncle
data.processed:
<story>Ha-ha-ha! Girl, you've got to pull out all the stops on these things! 
<story>The back of the line is starting to line up, so it's time to get to it!

data.text:
Eh, ah...ah, so-sorry! 
Well, here we go...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>Eh, ah...ah, so-sorry! 
<story>Well, here we go...

data.text: (Weird... I couldn't guess it...)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>(Weird... I couldn't guess it...)

data.text:
(Aaahhh....Why am I like this? 
...its not cool at all...)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>(Aaahhh....Why am I like this? 
<story>...its not cool at all...)

data.text: (Things didn't go as planned, even when I was feeling courageous)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>(Things didn't go as planned, even when I was feeling courageous)

data.text:
(I wonder if Trainer was disappointed too, its sure does... 
I knew it. I'm not like those two)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>(I wonder if Trainer was disappointed too, its sure does... 
<story>I knew it. I'm not like those two)

data.text: Eh
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Eh

data.text:
Cheval Grand, with the serious-looking and serious-eyed earlier. 
I remembered and laughed unbearably
data.processed:
<story>Cheval Grand, with the serious-looking and serious-eyed earlier. 
<story>I remembered and laughed unbearably

data.text:
T-Trainer? What's the matter? 
Could it be that you're so dumbfounded because of me!?
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>T-Trainer? What's the matter? 
<story>Could it be that you're so dumbfounded because of me!?

data.text:
I prefaced it with a laugh and said sorry, you're just too serious about everything 
I told her like that and also said it was fun and made me happy
data.processed:
<story>I prefaced it with a laugh and said sorry, you're just too serious about everything 
<story>I told her like that and also said it was fun and made me happy

data.text: Happy, you say...?
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Happy, you say...?

data.text:
I nodded my head. Because even in such a small way, 
I was so happy to see that She was serious for me
data.processed:
<story>I nodded my head. Because even in such a small way, 
<story>I was so happy to see that She was serious for me

data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Ah....

data.text:
(Trainer... 
who always accepts me... even im not sparkling at all)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>(Trainer... 
<story>who always accepts me... even im not sparkling at all)

data.text: (...even "on the other side" but still... next to me)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>(...even "on the other side" but still... next to me)

data.text: Trainer, someday... you may regret it
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Trainer, someday... you may regret it

data.text:
That you choose me. 
That you accepted me...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>That you choose me. 
<story>That you accepted me...

data.text:
There are many sparkling Horse girls, 
They are all... much more dazzling than I am.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>There are many sparkling Horse girls, 
<story>They are all... much more dazzling than I am.

data.text:
I-I know it... I know about it but still.... 
But, for me its just...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>I-I know it... I know about it but still.... 
<story>But, for me its just...

data.text:
Her voice is laced with fear. 
I soothed Cheval Grand, who seems to be anxious. And then-
data.processed:
<story>Her voice is laced with fear. 
<story>I soothed Cheval Grand, who seems to be anxious. And then-

data.text: I dismissed her words
data.processed: <story>I dismissed her words

data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>――――

data.text: That said, I don't regret the choice
data.processed: <story>That said, I don't regret the choice

data.text:
I'm glad I chose. Every time I see Cheval Grand, I think of her. 
Her efforts, like no other, 
give me confidence in this feeling every day
data.processed:
<story>I'm glad I chose. Every time I see Cheval Grand, I think of her. 
<story>Her efforts, like no other, 
<story>give me confidence in this feeling every day

data.text: T-Trainer....
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>T-Trainer....

data.text: (... I don't like myself when I'm all depressed)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>(... I don't like myself when I'm all depressed)

data.text:
(-And yet, in Trainer eyes, I look like "something", 
I'm like something sparkling)
data.name: Cheval Grand

data.text: (Oh... then, at least)
data.name: Cheval Grand

choices.text: Okay, let's get back to the academy and keep up the good work!

(I want to be able to believe in "Trainer believes in me" 
I want to be able to trust you)

Yes, Trainer 
I, I will do my best

data.text: (And then... I'd love to hear about it someday)
data.name: Cheval Grand

(...What do I look like in your eyes... 
How do you see me?)
data.name: Cheval Grand

title: Wish: I want to hear it someday
